info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:06PM EDT until July 17 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RICHMOND AND NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND COUNTIES... At 505 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leedstown, or 7 miles northwest of Montross, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Montross around 510 PM EDT. Colonial Beach around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lerty, Stratford Hall, Currioman Landing, Potomac Beach, Potomac Mills, Oak Grove, Singerly, Peeds, Foneswood and Westmoreland State. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
